PSTR datasets

Source: R/data.R
pstr_datasets.Rd

PSTR datasets

Usage

pstr_companies

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 28 rows and 10 columns.

Source

  • Companies, sectors, subsectors and products from Europages.

  • WEO data from the International Energy Agency (IEA)'s World Energy Outlook (WEO) 2022 scenario on the global level.

Author

Tilman Trompke.

Examples

pstr_companies
#> # A tibble: 28 × 10
#>    company_id          company_name clustered activity_uuid_produc…¹ isic_4digit
